modmenu.descriptionTranslation.difficult: Make block destruction more challenging or do nothing at all.
category.difficultyd.c1: Set item drop probability when breaking blocks
option.difficultyd.disable.tooptip: If disabled, the mod won't perform any actions.
option.difficultyd.blockwhitelistdisable: If true, whitelisted blocks won't be affected by probability drops.
option.difficultyd.blockwhitelist.toopti: Add block IDs to exclude them from probability drops.
option.difficultyd.hasSilkTouch: Silk Touch tool item drop probability: (0-100)
option.difficultyd.hasSilkTouch.tooptip: Change to set the probability when breaking blocks with Silk Touch.
option.difficultyd.hasFortune.tooptip: Change to set the probability when breaking blocks with Fortune.
option.difficultyd.normal.tooptip: Change to set the probability when breaking blocks with a regular tool.
option.difficultyd.emptyhanded.tooptip: If true, no items drop without tools.
option.difficultyd.emptyhandedchance.too: Change to set the probability of items dropping without tools.
option.difficultyd.actionbarchance.toopt: If true, display a random number indicating whether conditions are met.
option.difficultyd.slowblockwhitelistdis: If true, whitelisted blocks won't reduce player mining speed.
option.difficultyd.slowblockwhitelist.to: Add block IDs to exclude them from mining slowing effects.
option.difficultyd.slowmining.tooptip: If true, mining speed is reduced according to the set multiplier.
option.difficultyd.slowminingspeed.toopt: Change to set the destruction speed of any block while mining in survival mode.
option.difficultyd.foodlevel.tooptip: If true, there is a chance to consume a small amount of hunger when breaking blocks in survival mode.
option.difficultyd.foodlevelchance: Probability of breaking blocks consuming hunger: (0-100)
option.difficultyd.foodlevelchance.toopt: Change to set the probability of consuming hunger when breaking blocks in survival mode.
option.difficultyd.removefoodlevel: Amount of hunger to be deducted each time: (1-20)
option.difficultyd.removefoodlevel.toopt: Change to set the amount of hunger to be deducted each time a block is broken in survival mode.
